2011 sancharaka sammana ulela juli masayedi pawathwimata shri lanka sancharanaya katayuthu yoda athi bawa wadabalana janamadhya amathi ha aarthika sanwardhana niyojya amathi lakshman yapa abewardhana mahatha pawasiya.ehidi ansha 11 k yatathe kshethra 68 wenuwen sancharaka karmanthayata sambandha wishishtayin agayimata lakkeramin sammana pradhanaya karana bawa hethema kiweya.pasugiya wasarata wada thawath wishesha wu nawa kshethra 21 wenuwenda mewara sammana pradhanaya kirimata salasum sakaskara athi bawa ee mahatha prakasha kaleya.kolambaa taj samudra hotalaye pereda (15) pawathi madhya sakachchawata ekwemin lakshman yapa abewardhana mahatha ese sandahan kaleya.sancharaka kshethraye unnathiya wenuwen katayuthu kala widyuth madhya osse palawu prawruththi wisheshanga, wadasatahan menma madhyayepala wu puwath saha wisheshanga mehidi sammanayata pathra karana bawa niyojya amathiwaraya awadharanaya kaleya.mita amatharawa sancharatha web adawi saha wides madhyawedin sandaha wu hondama prawardhana wadasatahanada thoraganimata katayuthu yoda athi bawath, sancharaka wyaparikayinwa piliganima ha agayimata lakkaramin, sancharaka karmanthaya ha karyabharyaya ihala thalayakata osawa thabamin dirimath kirima mema sammana ulele aramuna ha abhilashaya bawath ee mahatha prakasha kaleya.me awasthawata shri lanka sancharanaye sabhapathi aacharya nalaka godahewa mahatha athulu niladharin rasak sahabhagi wi sitiyaha..
ee, mehi prathipala 'esanin' labagatha nohaki bawaya.

ee wenakotath natharawena thanak ganawath hithala nothibuna hinda api pahuwenidata daganna hithan hiti wisit ekakuth thibuna nisa nawathana nuwara pahukarala bandarawela paththata wenna wage hoyaganna hithagenayi hitiye..

kiya ahagena kussiyata giye nidimathemayi.kama kamare thira nodamu janelaya haraha penuna dasuna mawa hiti adiyema natharakale papuwe gambauruma thanaka yamak hirakaramin.mage akka..mage aadaraniya akka..kussiye the hadana thana bima guliwi wadiwela dathin papuwata yamak thadin hirakaragena sitiya..sama witama sinarali walin wasagena siti age duka pupuragos dore galayamin thibuna....handum nawatha ganna dadi aragalayaka niratha unath, sumudu thalelu kammul pengiyanna tharamata galu kandulu nawathagannata ayata hakiune naha...ayage muhune etharam wedanawak satahan wi thibenawa mama mita pera dakala thibbe naha...akkage kandulu eetharam barata kawadawath watila naha......aayasayen das hara nagisiti akka ethek papuwata sirakaragena siti - appachchi the bona, ande paluddak athi panipata koppayata siruwen the wathkala.eka husmak wath nohela pashanibhuthawi balasiti mage das wagirenna gaththe,mita wasara kihipayakata pera mahapola sanakeliyakin akkama mata genathdun mikimawus rupaandi the joguwa aya kandulu waki kammulata thadakaragath mohotheyi.ethana thawath randi inna mata shakthiyak thibbe naha.nanakamarayata duwan gos dorawasagena,jalakaramaye handata muwawela mama hodatama aduwa.....dore wana thibu akkage kahapaha suwandathi saluwa mirikagena mama aduwa....."ko me the hadanna giya ayath na..balanna giya ayath na..wije rajjurawanta una wageda.."ee appachchiyi.ethakotama akka dorata gahanna gaththa ayata nanna oonayayi kiyamin.ayath mamath ahaka balagenama ekineka pasukaran giya.wiwidhakarayata hadapu the samaga bandesiya mesaya uda thaniwela.akka eya salayata aran gos naha.the bandesiya athata gathwahama ara papuwe sirawima nawatha danuna.akkage the kalawa...appachchita sini nodamu kahata the..ammata,punchita ha aachchammata hakurukata samaga the..nuwara bappata gastrik nisa sudukiri...podi ekata lawata kahata damu kiri..loku akkata supurudu paridi kopi...ayiyata,nandalata kirithe...ee athare mage nestomolt joguwa..me siyalla nihandawa dum damamin thibbe akka handanu daka duka wawagannata baruwa wageyi..
